attributes.action: Petition to make Lewisham a Royal Borough
attributes.additional_details: We the people of Lewisham (Borough) want Royal Borough status, this is a desired move that has had had good feedback from the common people. We the people feel this move is a good move and will persue the matter in whatever way we can. Please find below signatures from the good people of the Lewisham borough in relation to the said matter for future review by the Government of England, Scotland and Wales.
